SamPy.dates.julians.toJulian¶

SamPy.dates.julians.toJulian(year, month, day, hour, minute, timezone='UTC')¶

This function converts a given date to Modified Julian Date.

Note :

The function uses Python’s inbuilt time module.
Parameters:
  • year – year
  • year – int or float
  • month – month
  • month – int or float
  • day – days
  • day – int or float
  • hour (int or float) – hours
  • minute (int or float) – minutes
  • timezone (string) – Timezone, default is UTC
Returns:

Modified Julian Date
Return type:

float
